headline: Is Builders FirstSource (BLDR) Pricing Reflect Housing Demand Optimism Or Future Earnings Reality
summary: If you are wondering whether Builders FirstSource is attractively priced at its recent levels, you are not alone. This article walks through what the current share price might be implying about future expectations. The stock last closed at US$126.79, with returns of 2.2% over 7 days, 22.2% over 30 days, 21.2% year to date, a 22.7% decline over 1 year, 75.0% over 3 years and 202.4% over 5 years. Recent news around Builders FirstSource has centered on ongoing interest in US construction...
